overview: Real estate agent Michelle Lay has a house to sell, and hot, young buyer James Deen wants more than typical walk through. But when Michelle's daughter Lexi Belle returns home with her new fiancÃ©, Michelle realizes she just had sex with her son-in-law to be! Will she let Lexi marry a man that can't be trusted or will she keep their forbidden secret hidden? Meanwhile Michelle's lesbian lover Brittany O'Connell is harboring secrets too, one of which includes Michelle's resentful ex-husband, Mark Davis. Deceptions abound in this tale of emotional and sexual intrigue, and the power of forbidden lust.
title: Open House
